scripts.test:introsort:bun: echo '=== Running Introsort Tests with Bun ===' && bun src/introsort_original.ts && echo '' && bun src/introsort_gemini.ts && echo '' && bun src/introsort_typed_gemini.ts
scripts.test:introsort:node: echo '=== Running Introsort Tests with Node ===' && tsc && node ./dist/introsort_original.js && echo '' && node ./dist/introsort_gemini.js && echo '' && node ./dist/introsort_typed_gemini.js
